title: **6 WEEKS FREE** Brand New East Austin Homes!
posting_body: Pet-friendly community with its very own Pet Spa and Dog Park and pleanty of nearby parks like Windsor Park and Town Lake & Bike Trail for pleanty of options for your furry friend!

Featuring a 17th-floor pool deck with jumbo movie screen, 16th-floor community lounge with views of the Capitol and Austin, 4th-floor pool deck with lounge seating, 4th-floor zen garden and also a community lounge with entertaining bar for all the fun you'll need without having to leave your home!
Brand new apartment with some seriously awesome downtown views.
Boasting walkability to the East side and its finest restaurants, bars and coffee shops with less than a 5 minute WALK to downtown!
it's the perfect place to land in town.
Get all the exercise you could ever want at the indoor basketball court with attached dynamic fitness center and feel free to store your bike and other equipment in the provided bike storage!
Please don't miss out on this deal, Call/Text to check it out now!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
